channel.title: Plz fix
channel.description:
if you dont agree with some of the Current Community members, post here
more than enough morons have been given the CM rank, please review all members and the validity of future applicants. the two newest administrators do not seem to know how to not abuse their power, please fix this too. in case you were wondering what decided to make me post this, lothy recently made this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=147081]retard[/url] cm

item.title: Plz fix

item.title: Plz fix

item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:201821”]On another note James, how long are you G:lined for on IRC? We’re all missing your presence. At least the so-called morons that have achieved Community Member status lately can behave.[/quote]my gline ended a few days ago, i voluntarily stay away because of idiots

ps, the gline was also voluntary

item.title: Plz fix
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

For your information, James, it was a large number of Community Members that gave rep to ``jason.
Actually, all but one rep message comes from Community Members.

And contrary to the belief that you (and probably many others) hold, people can get to the position via means other than programming.

Any other stupid things that you’d like to say James? I’m all eyes.

[quote=“Mopman, post:2, topic:201821”]I thought CM was given automatically based on rep, and CC was given based on popularity… sorry, contribution.

?[/quote]
That is essentially the case. However we do check the reasons (and I check the posts) - if they’re absolutely stupid then I just delete them.

On another note James, how long are you G:lined for on IRC? We’re all missing your presence. At least the so-called morons that have achieved Community Member status lately can behave.

Read full topic

item.title: Plz fix

item.description:
@frank wrote:

it wasnt/isnt automatic, the idiots who abuse rep shouldnt be let in. just because it is a lesser rank than CC doesnt mean that it should not be a quality section
